London's sins reproved and sorrows lamented, or, A sober check, together with a friendly admonition, to the wilfull, wicked, and wofull city of London under the consideration of her present grievous sins and growing sufferings. E. N.
1 broadside.
[s.n.], London printed : 1665.
Signed: E.N. Imperfect: creased and stained, with loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
